data.eml:eml: A new species of Crocidura (Soricomorpha: Soricidae) from southern Vietnam and north-eastern Cambodia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jenkins, Paulina D., Abramov, Alexei V., Rozhnov, Viatcheslav V., Olsson, Annette (2010): A new species of Crocidura (Soricomorpha: Soricidae) from southern Vietnam and north-eastern Cambodia. Zootaxa 2345: 60-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193377
